darija: بغيت نهضر معاك ف واحد الموضوع
darija_latin: bghit nehder m3ak f wahed lmawdu3
english: I want to talk to you about something

msa.phrase: أريد أن أتحدث معك في موضوع
msa.latin: urid an atahadath ma3ak fi mawdu3

english: You need to take the medicine
How are we going to do it?

msa.phrase: كان هذا لا بد أن يحدث
msa.latin: kana hadha la budda an yahduth

english: I want to know your opinion
Do you know how to drive?
Do you have any news about him?
I don't have the right to do that

msa.phrase: ليس لي الحق في فعل ذلك
msa.latin: laysa li alha' fi fi3l thalik

english: How do I explain to you?
I've been waiting for you for a long time
I don't know how to deal with him
This is what I was waiting for
I don't want to waste my time
Someone is waiting for you outside
I was afraid I was late

msa.phrase: كنت خائفاً أن أكون قد تأخرت
msa.latin: kuntu kha'ifan an akun qad ta'akhkhart

english: I want to change the subject
That's not how it should be
I still have a lot of work

msa.phrase: ما زال لدي الكثير من العمل
msa.latin: ma zala ladayya alkathir min al3amal

english: I have no doubt in you
Did you bring money with you?
Do you think he will succeed?
Do you have any other question?
I'll wait until you come back
I'm starting to understand a bit
How many times did I tell you?
Do you know how to cook?
